name: scriptsp
description: Run multiple package.json scripts in parallel (for development)
author: smallhelm

scripts.test: standard && npm run dev1;npm run dev2;npm run devE;npm run devR;npm run colors
scripts.watch-js: node -e "setInterval(function(){console.error('1234567 bytes written to public/bundle.js (0.50 seconds)')}, 1000)"
scripts.dev2: bin/scriptsp dev:server dev:server dev:server dev:test dev:client
scripts.colors: bin/scriptsp dev:server dev:server dev:server dev:server dev:server dev:server dev:server dev:server dev:test dev:test dev:test dev:test dev:test dev:test dev:client dev:client dev:client dev:client dev:client
